name: blazikenite
effect: Held: Allows Blaziken to Mega Evolve into Mega Blaziken.
short_effect: Held: Allows Blaziken to Mega Evolve into Mega Blaziken.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Blaziken hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
